name: Ashish B Chauhan
label: Full-Stack Developer
summary: Adaptable Full Stack Web Developer with 1 year of professional experience across tech industries, freelance projects, and IT in the mining sector. Proficient in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) and back-end solutions (Node.js, AWS), with additional expertise in WordPress and WooCommerce development. Demonstrated success delivering local news website projects as a freelancer. Known for exceptional problem-solving abilities through methodical research and strong collaborative skills in team environments. Passionate about creating intuitive, responsive web experiences while continuously expanding technical knowledge to deliver innovative solutions.

work_experience.summary: Managed IT infrastructure and provided technical support in the mining industry, ensuring optimal operations of critical systems.
highlights: Administered and maintained server infrastructure, implementing solutions to prevent downtime.
Performed troubleshooting and technical support for company-wide computing systems.
Ensured proper functioning of all computer systems for seamless business operations.

work_experience.summary: Provided comprehensive technical support for computer systems and server infrastructure.
highlights: Maintained and optimized computer networks to ensure maximum uptime.
Performed regular diagnostics and troubleshooting of hardware and software issues.
Implemented preventative maintenance procedures to extend equipment lifespan.

projects.title: Citizen Chhattisgarh News Portal
projects.summary: Developed and launched a regional news portal from the ground up using WordPress, optimized for performance and user engagement.
highlights: Built responsive, user-friendly interface with customized WordPress implementation.
Grew user base to 50,000 visitors in the first month, achieving Google AdSense approval.
Configured Google Console operations for optimal SEO performance and analytics.

images.caption: Citizen Chhattisgarh News Portal Home Page

projects.title: Chhattisgarh Ki Bhavishya Website
projects.summary: Reimagined the website and launched a regional news portal using WordPress, optimized for performance and user engagement.
highlights: Built responsive, user-friendly interface with customized WordPress implementation.

Significantly enhanced website performance and user experience by optimizing page load speed and implementing intuitive navigation. Key improvements included image compression, code minification, and strategic caching, resulting in a faster, more engaging experience for visitors.
Configured Google Console operations for optimal SEO performance and analytics.

projects.title: Vaishnav Sangeet Mahavidhyalaya Website(Under Development)
projects.summary: Currently developing a modern web platform for an Indian classical dance institution.
highlights: Designing and implementing responsive frontend interface using React.
Creating intuitive navigation and information architecture to enhance user experience.
Implementing custom features to showcase performances, classes, and cultural significance.

volunteer_experience.summary: Provide comprehensive technical support and social media management for a national cultural dance event.
highlights: Manage all technical aspects of event production including sound, lighting, and displays.
Lead social media marketing campaigns resulting in increased event visibility and attendance.
Recognized with a medal of honor for outstanding technical contributions to the event.

interests.name: Music Exploration
interests.summary: Passionate about discovering and analyzing diverse musical genres and artists, expanding cultural appreciation and creative inspiration.

interests.name: Solo Travel & Adventure
interests.summary: Enjoy motorcycle journeys and independent travel experiences that foster problem-solving skills, adaptability, and fresh perspectives applicable to professional challenges.

references.name: Tulsi Ram - HR Manager(Sainik Mining)
references.reference: An exceptional IT professional who consistently demonstrated outstanding technical ability in managing our server infrastructure. His quick response time and problem-solving skills were invaluable to maintaining our operations. He approaches challenges methodically and always delivers effective solutions under pressure.

references.name: Shahajada Khan - Owner(Citizen Chhattisgarh)
references.reference: I was thoroughly impressed with how quickly he developed our entire news portal from concept to launch. His technical expertise in WordPress and site optimization helped us achieve remarkable growth in a short time. Most importantly, his ongoing support and immediate response to our technical needs has been exemplary, proving his dedication goes far beyond project completion.
